PCIeFunction.longDescription: OEM Extension for PCIeFunction to support Device SubClass mode.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DeviceSubClass.description: The subclass for this PCIe function.
DeviceSubClass.longDescription: This property shall contain the device subclass of the PCIe device function, such as storage, network, or memory.
